Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, City of Franklin
Water and Sewer Commission No. 4 -- 14.67 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Water and Sewer Commission No. 4 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall St. Mary Parish Water and Sewer Commission No. 4, State of Louisiana (the "Commission"), levy a fourteen and sixty-seven hundredths (14.67) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $511,000) on all the property subject to taxation in the Commission for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of operating, maintaining, improving and extending the waterworks plant and system and sewer and sewerage treatment or disposal facilities owned and/or operated by the Commission?

Race.SpecificTitle: Water and Sewer Commission No. 5 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Water and Sewer Commission No. 5 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall St. Mary Parish Water and Sewer Commission No. 5, State of Louisiana (the "Commission"), levy a ten (10) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $340,000) on all the property subject to taxation in the Commission for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of operating, maintaining, improving and extending the water, sewer and sewerage treatment or disposal facilities within the boundaries of the Commission?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drainage District No. 6 -- 7.83 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. 6 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Gravity Drainage District No. 6 of the Parish of St. Mary, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of seven and eighty-three hundredths (7.83) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $530,240 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the District?
